name: Beauty Paradise
description:
You find yourself at your grandmother Umi's beach resort. Looking forward to a great summer where they can finally put the past to rest and reconnect with this side of the family.But there is a catchWhen you find that your plans to relax are ruined as your grandmother is ill and she asks if you can help fill in for her whilst she recovers.
Now your time here will be filled with work at this beachside resort instead of play.Still there is an upsideThe resort is filled with a whole host of beautiful female staff to work alongside.FeaturesFemale Protagonist
Huge Array of Decisions, each affecting the stories events
Multiple different endings to uncover
Secrets to unlock and explore
Huge variety of locations and characters
Large cast of characters and romances
